content: How much does this service cost

The pricing for BlueThistle AI services is as follows:
- **Basic AI Package**: £500 setup fee, with an optional £750 monthly retainer.
- **Advanced AI Package**: £750 setup fee, with an optional £1,200 monthly retainer.
- **24/7 AI Support Package (Premium)**: £1,000 setup fee, with an optional £1,500 monthly retainer【8†source】.
How fast can this be implemented into my company

The implementation timeframes for BlueThistle AI services are:
- **Basic AI Package**: 2 to 3 weeks.
- **Advanced AI Package**: 4 to 6 weeks.
- **24/7 AI Support Package**: 6 to 8 weeks.
- All packages include a follow-up 1 week after delivery .
